name: Ambulance City Rush - Emergency Car Racing Games
name_original: Ambulance City Rush - Emergency Car Racing Games
description:
Ambulance Rush is the latest racing game to hit the streets. However, instead of driving a sports car, you get to sit behind the wheel of an ambulance. Race down the streets, avoid oncoming obstacles, and try to make your way to the end.

Will you be able to make it?

FEATURES

- 3D rendered graphics.
- Easy controls.
- Cool soundtrack.
- Lots of fun!
